title: Adamant chainbody

properties.name: description
properties.value: Adamant chainbody is piece of armour made from adamant. A player can create an adamant chainbody by using an adamant bar on an anvil while a hammer and 3 adamant bars are in the player's inventory. A Smithing level of 81 is required to make an adamant chainbody and doing so will grant the player 187.5 Smithing experience. Level 30 Defence is required to wear an adamant chainbody. It can also be bought from Wayne's Chains in south Falador. One adamant chainbody is required for Song of the Elves.

Item ID1111

Adamant chainbody is piece of armour made from adamant. A player can create an adamant chainbody by using an adamant bar on an anvil while a hammer and 3 adamant bars are in the player's inventory. A Smithing level of 81 is required to make an adamant chainbody and doing so will grant the player 187.5 Smithing experience. Level 30 Defence is required to wear an adamant chainbody. It can also be bought from Wayne's Chains in south Falador. One adamant chainbody is required for Song of the Elves.
